author: Channel Awesome
description:
Doug gives his thoughts on Glitch's first 2D animated show: Knights of Gwynavere.

Join our YouTube Members - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiH828EtgQjTyNIMH6YiOSw/join

Watch the new Nostalgia Critic - https://youtu.be/7x7aigWbpH0

Check out our store - https://channelawesome.myshopify.com/

Knights of Guinevere is an Australian adult independent-animated web series created and written by Dana Terrace, Zach Marcus, and John Bailey Owen, directed by Terrace, and produced by Glitch Productions. The series has been described as a sci-fi psychological thriller by Glitch Productions

title: Disney Must be so Happy
